column5: Our home is located inside a safe gated community. Make our renovated 3 bedroom 2 bath townhome your home for your next visit to Houston! We have enough room to easily fit 10 but can accommodate 13 if needed. House is fully updated with luxury finishes. It's minutes away from the NRG Stadium, Museum District, Downtown Houston, parks, zoo, medical center and University of Houston.  This location has multiple restaurants and shopping centers at a great walking distance, only a block away.
